name: RUBATO Demo
description:
A collect-a-thon about a frog fixing the solar system after it explodes for some reason. Nice.
  • 1-2 hours long. 3-5 hours if you're new to action games. Potentially 500+ hours if you take an hour break every time you blink.
  • Features experimental collect-a-thon styled progression inspired by games like Super Mario Odyssey, where you collect "planet bits" to level your health up and unlock the area boss. There are a total of 28 planet bits in this demo.
  • Has like 7 NPCs. Know a game with EXACTLY 7 NPCs? Exactly.
  • Features expressive pixel art and animations created by a small team of friends... and terrible developer art by the software programmer.
  • Contains the complete first area of the game, "The BAKERY" (without any restrictions or limitations!). Save files transfer to the final game!
  • We have an E. 
Like the tunes you hear in the game? Support the game by having a look at the soundtrack!
